job.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer in Test
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: At Sonos we want to create the ultimate listening experience for our customers and know that it starts by listening to each other As part of the Sonos team youll collaborate with people of all styles skill sets and backgrounds to realize our vision while fostering a community where everyone feels included and empowered to do the best work of their livesltbrgtltbrgtAs a Sr SDET you will represent the Software Quality Engineering discipline in the Professional software group You will strive for service engineering excellence and will be a handson leader who will drive design for the Cloud CICD deployment pipeline and develop test automationltbrgtltbrgtThis will require collaboration with DevOps and multiple quality teams to design enhance existing pipelines and execute automation test strategies in order to deliver high quality productsltbrgtltbrgtWhat Youll Doltbrgtltulgtltligt Engineer new automated cloud CICD deployment pipelines or enhance existing pipelines to support web controller cloud services and embedded devices ltligtltligt Collaborate and work with team members drive and document test strategies design edge cases and conduct manual and automated testing for features across all platforms iOS Android and Linux ltligtltligt Constantly perform gap analysis to ensure good test coverage assess and provide proactive solutions ltligtltligt Investigate logs to determine root cause and establish prioritization of any issues discovered during manual andor automated testing that runs in a CI environment ltligtltligt Mentor other members of the team to expand their technical competencies and to adapt the best software engineering practices ltligtltligt Participate in the oncall services support ltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat Youll NeedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBasic Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt BSc in Computer Science Software Engineering or equivalent experience ltligtltligt 5 years of experience in a senior backend  service side automation and testing role ltligtltligt Proven experience with CICD server backend APIs and Cloud services automation testing ltligtltligt Experience with GitHub Jira Jenkins Dockerized containers Nodejs ReactJS LinuxUnix ltligtltligt Demonstrate proficiency writing code for automation with one or more of the following Python JavascriptTypescript Groovy C ltligtltligt Experience with data telemetry dashboards system reliability objective quality results and metricsltligtltulgt
